properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 14 at 2:10AM PST until January 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 35 to 45 kt with
gusts up to 55 kt and seas 12 to 17 ft at 13 seconds expected.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous seas
15 to 17 ft at 13 seconds expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 11 to 15 ft at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Wednesday to 4 AM
PST Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and seas will be highest south of and
5 nm beyond Coos Bay.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY
